metadata.dc:author: Muñoz Sánchez, J
Sánchez Fernández, J M
Saint-Gerons Marzo, S
Macías Fernández, J A
metadata.dc:description: The parotid Actinomycosis is a very uncommon infectious disease. In this article one case is presented discussing several aspects of its diagnosis and treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Actinomicosis parotidea. A propósito de un caso.
[Parotid actinomycosis. Apropos of a case].
